1472900.name: Dreadlands Demo
1472900.description:
Dreadlands Demo

This demo allows you to play through the early part of the Scrapper campaign. If you beat the Demo you will also unlock the TOP HAT cosmetic for use in the full game. But to continue your journey in the Dreadlands you will have to purchase the Full Game.

There are some restrictions in the Demo:
  • Max Fame level is 2.
  • Max Fighter level is 3.
  • Multiplayer is disabled in the Demo.
  • All side-quests are disabled.

Thank you for playing the Demo!",
1472900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
